search_results.query: php convert special symbols to html

snippet.title: TV Schedule | Cartoon Network Show Listings
snippet.description: Find a complete schedule of local listings for all your favorite shows. Discover what to watch and when to find it on Cartoon Network.

snippet.title: Station Wagon Convertible
snippet.description: A station wagon turns into a convertible when the team blows the roof off. Watch more Destroy Build Destroy on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: The Bully Effect Special
snippet.description: This special takes a closer look at Alex Libby's bullying problem and how his situation changed when someone spoke up against bullying.

snippet.title: Stop Bullying: Speak Up - You Are Special
snippet.description: Watch what happens when some planets start picking on the moon.

snippet.title: Stop Bullying: Speak Up Special (English ADS)
snippet.description: Watch kids share their stories as they talk about the effects of bullying in their own lives. This version includes an audio description soundtrack.

snippet.title: Stop Bullying: Speak Up Special
snippet.description: Watch kids share their stories as they talk about the effects of bullying in their own lives.

snippet.title: Stop Bullying: Speak Up Special
snippet.description: Watch kids share their stories as they talk about the effects of bullying in their own lives.

snippet.title: The Bully Effect - AC360 Special
snippet.description: Witness the true story of Alex Libby and how bullying affected his life.

snippet.title: Viewer Special
snippet.description: Viewer Special: Uncle Grandpa announces the winner of a contest to draw the latest episode of Uncle Grandpa. Too bad the winner is a metalhead who torments the gang with his strange doodles.

snippet.title: Funny Money
snippet.description: Special agents interrogate Mordecai and his friends about some counterfeit Amadeus Dollars. Watch more Regular Show on Cartoon Network!
